about.details:
Incorporated in 1992, Tasty Dairy Specialities Ltd is engaged in processing milk, along with bulk milk procurement and handling during season time which primarily caters to bulk and marquee institutional customers. Company is further involved in value added milk products like Skimmed Milk Powder, Butter, Ghee, Dairy Whitener, Concentrated Milk etc.

They have wide range of quality dairy products which includes Pasteurized Liquid Milk, Cream, Butter (White/Salted), Pure Desi Ghee (Clarified Butter), Paneer (Fresh Cottage Cheese), Skimmed Milk Powder, Full Cream Milk Powder, Dairy Whitener, Instant Gulab Jamun Mix, Peda (an Indian Sweet), Mithai Powder etc. Thhey are packaged under the brand names “UJJWAL”, “SHIKHAR”, “VERIFRESH”, "CIMA", "MITHAI MASTER" and are available in Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh and Bihar,

Currently they process approximately 5,00,000 litres of raw milk which comprises of 1,60,000 litres of milk packaging, 20,000 litres of buttermilk packaging, 2,20,000 Litres of Skimmed Milk Powder and Ghee and 2,00,000 litres of bulk milk processing.

Company's customer base includes Delhi Milk scheme (a Central Government of India Organisation), Mother Dairy (wholly owned subsidiary of the National Dairy Development Board (NDDB)), Parle Products, Sterling Agro Industries Limited, Kwality Dairy Limited, Perfetti Van Melle etc.

contactDetails.full_address: Tasty Dairy Specialities Ltd, D - 3 UPSIDC Industrial Area, Jainpur Kanpur Dehat - 209 311

faqs.question: What is the Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO?
faqs.answer:
Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO is a SME IPO of 5430000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹24.44 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹45 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on February 7, 2018, and closes on February 12, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO opens on February 7, 2018 and closes on February 12, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO?
faqs.answer: Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,35,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Tasty Dairy Specialities IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
